description: News about Libor (Barclays Interest Rate Manipulation Case), including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Libor (Barclays Interest Rate Manipulation Case)
title_page: Libor (Barclays Interest Rate Manipulation Case) - The New York Times
maintext:
Two former Deutsche Bank traders win their appeal in a Libor manipulation case.
But ruling is another indication of the difficulty prosecutors have had making the case that traders at a handful of big banks conspired to profit from manipulating Libor, the benchmark once used by banks to set interest rates.
